quantity.description: Quantity of the billable metric used during the specified timeframe

timeframe_start.description: Start timestamp of the timeframe during which the usage data is captured

timeframe_end.description: End timestamp of the timeframe during which the usage data is captured

billable_metric_name.description: Name of the billable metric associated with the subscription usage

billable_metric_id.description: Unique identifier for the billable metric associated with the subscription usage

subscription_id.description: Unique identifier for the subscription the usage data belongs to
